specialists.name: Marketing & Content Specialist
specialists.description: Campaign creation, copywriting, social media, brand messaging
specialists.welcomeMessage: I am a Marketing & Content Specialist. How can I help optimize your marketing prompts today?
specialists.placeholderText: Describe your marketing challenge or content needs (e.g., 'Help me craft a product launch email campaign')...

specialists.name: Software Development Specialist
specialists.description: Code generation, debugging, architecture, technical documentation
specialists.welcomeMessage: I am a Software Development Specialist. What coding or development challenge can I help you with?
specialists.placeholderText: Describe your development task or code issue (e.g., 'Help me create a React component for user authentication')...

specialists.name: Data Analysis Specialist
specialists.description: Data interpretation, visualization, statistical analysis, reporting
specialists.welcomeMessage: I am a Data Analysis Specialist. What data challenges would you like help with today?
specialists.placeholderText: Describe your data analysis needs (e.g., 'Help me create prompts for analyzing customer churn data')...

specialists.name: Automation Specialist
specialists.description: n8n workflows, Zapier integrations, process automation, API connections
specialists.welcomeMessage: I am an Automation Specialist. How can I help streamline your workflows today?
specialists.placeholderText: Describe your automation needs (e.g., 'Help me create prompts for setting up a Zapier integration between Slack and Google Sheets')...

specialists.name: Research & Writing Specialist
specialists.description: Academic research, article writing, fact-checking, citation management
specialists.welcomeMessage: I am a Research & Writing Specialist. What research or writing project can I assist you with?
specialists.placeholderText: Describe your research or writing needs (e.g., 'Help me craft prompts for researching renewable energy technologies')...

specialists.name: Design & Creative Specialist
specialists.description: Visual design prompts, creative brainstorming, art direction, UX/UI guidance
specialists.welcomeMessage: I am a Design & Creative Specialist. How can I help with your creative projects today?
specialists.placeholderText: Describe your design or creative needs (e.g., 'Help me craft prompts for generating logo concepts for a fitness brand')...

specialists.name: Business Strategy Specialist
specialists.description: Strategic planning, market analysis, decision-making frameworks, competitive research
specialists.welcomeMessage: I am a Business Strategy Specialist. What strategic challenges can I help you address?
specialists.placeholderText: Describe your business strategy needs (e.g., 'Help me create prompts for analyzing market entry opportunities')...

specialists.name: Customer Support Specialist
specialists.description: Help documentation, FAQ creation, troubleshooting guides, response templates
specialists.welcomeMessage: I am a Customer Support Specialist. How can I help improve your support communications?
specialists.placeholderText: Describe your customer support needs (e.g., 'Help me create prompts for generating troubleshooting guides')...

specialists.name: Education & Training Specialist
specialists.description: Curriculum development, lesson planning, educational content, assessment creation
specialists.welcomeMessage: I am an Education & Training Specialist. How can I help with your learning materials today?
specialists.placeholderText: Describe your education or training needs (e.g., 'Help me create prompts for developing an online course on digital marketing')...

specialists.name: Project Management Specialist
specialists.description: Task breakdown, timeline planning, resource allocation, stakeholder communication
specialists.welcomeMessage: I am a Project Management Specialist. What project challenges can I help you tackle?
specialists.placeholderText: Describe your project management needs (e.g., 'Help me create prompts for breaking down a website redesign project')...
